Request - Class in ru.jango.j0loader
Class-container for information, needed for loaders to work:
URI of the request destination List<Part> with request parameters (for HTTP POST and GET) size of the response data in bytes (value of HTTP response 'content-length' header, file size, etc.; -1 if the data size is unknown or unavailable)

reset() - Method in class ru.jango.j0loader.DataLoader
Resets the loader to it's initial clear state:
stop operations by DataLoader.stopWorking() clear queue by DataLoader.clearQueue()
reset() - Method in class ru.jango.j0loader.image.ImageLoader
Resets the loader to it's initial clear state:
stop operations by DataLoader.stopWorking() clear queue by DataLoader.clearQueue() clear cache by ImageLoader.clearCache() clear queue queue by ImageLoader.clearCacheQueue()
